title: EnaNNa ninagEnaNNa
sahitya:
EnaNNa ninagEnaNNa.  rAgA:  Anandabhairavi.  Adi tALA.


1:  EnaNNa ninagEnaNNa kaNNE kaNNa muccavolyaNNa 
EnaNNa ninna gOLaNNa kaNNinda nODavolyaNNa
 caraNam 2    kUnaNNa balu kUnaNNa giriya hyAnge nI hOtyaNNa 
hIna asurara hyAngaNNa mOsava nI mADidyaNNa
 caraNam 3    hallaNNa kOre hallaNNa bhUviya hyAnge nI hodyaNNa
oLLe oLLe bhakutarana mecce nInu bandyaNNa
 caraNam 4    pOrana more kELiyaNNa kambhadinda bandyaNNa 
ghOravAda nODava nODi avanappana nI baDidyaNNa
 caraNam 5    puTTu puTTu hejjeNNa iTTU nIyadaranna 
koTTa maNNIna onde pAri aLedyaNNa nI aLedyaNNa
 caraNam 6    rAmaNNa baDibyADanna rAyanobba nillaNNa 
namma rAmaNNa huTTa bEkaNNa rAvaNana baDibEkaNNa
 caraNam 7    elyaNNa nI huTTidyaNNa elyaNNa nI beLedyaNNa 
kolla bandu heNNina EnaNNa nI mADidyaNNa
 caraNam 8    mAnava nI kaLedyaNNa mAniniyara piDidyaNNa 
mAnavara pAlivudakke kudureya nI EridyaNNa
 caraNam 9    vyartavAgi jadalaNNa varSagaLu pOyidaNNa 
maredu hOgade kELaNNa ninna dhyAnavenage nIDaNNa
 caraNam 10    illaNNa kELa illaNNa nInillade ondillaNNa 
ellAvu nI balyaNNa ninna ballavarellaNNa
 caraNam 11    modalaNNa nI modalaNNa koLeyaliruva nInaNNa 
modalu konegaLu illaNNa tande purandara viTTalaNNa
